title: Secrets
description: Secrets passed into the pipeline such as API Keys or configuration settings.

REPO_RAW_ROOT.description: The Base URL for retrieving raw text files from GitHub

REPO_API_ROOT.description: The base URL for all GitHub API operations

EMBED_WHITELIST.description: Comma-separated list of allowed hostnames for embeds. Supports `*.example.com` as a subdomain wildcard. Use `*` to allow all embeds (potentially insecure)

EMBED_SERVICE.description: URL of an Embed Service that takes the appended URL and returns an embeddable HTML representation.

EMBED_SELECTOR.description: Selector to be used when resolving internal embeds.

IMAGES_MIN_SIZE.description: Minimum physical width of responsive images to generate

HTTP_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout for outgoing HTTP requests in milliseconds

XML_PRETTY.description: Print XML with line breaks and indentation

SANITIZE_DOM.description:
Sanitize the HTML output to guard against XSS attacks. 

**Note:** this flag applies a pretty aggressive DOM filtering that will strip out a lot of HTML that your authors might find useful. The setting is meant for processing truly untrusted inputs, such as comments in a social media site.

RESOLVE_GITREF_SERVICE.description: API endpoint or action name to the service that resolves github refs to commit SHAs.
